description: Lead the technology team driving innovation in green energy solutions. Oversaw software development, process automation, and system scalability to optimize operations.
Built scalable Flutter apps with clean architecture and thorough testing. Taught algorithms to 30 students, mentored 10 individually, improving problem-solving skills.
Developed and maintained backend services using Python for LangGraph LLM projects. Built automation workflows with n8n to streamline operational tasks and improve process efficiency.
